# NSAttributedString.DocumentType

**Structure**

Constants for the document type document attribute key.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DocumentType
```

## Overview

Use these constants as values for the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/DocumentAttributeKey/documentType] key in the document attributes dictionary.

## Getting keys for document types

- **docFormat**: Microsoft Word document.
- **html**: Hypertext markup language (HTML) document.
- **macSimpleText**: Macintosh SimpleText document.
- **officeOpenXML**: ECMA Office Open XML text document format.
- **openDocument**: OASIS Open Document text document format.
- **plain**: Plain text document.
- **rtf**: Rich text format document.
- **rtfd**: Rich text format with attachments document.
- **webArchive**: WebKit WebArchive document.
- **wordML**: Microsoft Word XML (WordML schema) document.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**: Creates a document type.
- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a document type with the specified raw value.

## Getting document-wide attributes

- **NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey**: The attributes you apply to an entire document.
- **NSAttributedString.DocumentReadingOptionKey**: Options for constructing an attributed string from data you read from disk.
- **HTML attributes**: Documentwide attributes that provide control over the form of generated HTML.
- **NSAttributedString.TextLayoutSectionKey**: Constants for the text layout sections document attribute key.
- **NSTextScalingType**: Constants that specify the text scaling.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
